author: Benjamin White
comment: Thank you so much for this! It's really amazing and I personally think it's worth every penny! Keep up the amazing work!

author: Dave Feltham
comment: Time says 00 at noon and overall has some performance issues on the Zenwatch 3

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Which version are you using? Please tell me more with an email if you want!

author: Aidan Heather
comment: My reason for owning a smart watch. Thank you!

author: 5threel
comment: Can you please add 12 hour options as well?

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: You can do it from Watchmaker settings! It's all written in the FAQ!

author: Horia Popescu
comment: I love how customisable the watchface is. Was a bit annoyed at first that I had to also get Watchmaker Premium to use it, but it was definitely worth it. I enjoy constantly changing its functions and adapting it to what I need (and Watchmaker really allows me to do that, but it took some getting used to). My only criticism is that on my watch the more advanced of the watchfaces included does not really work that well (lags constantly and drains my battery), but that is obviously due to my hardware limitations. Still, it would be nice to have a lighter version of that watchface as well.

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Thanks! I'm working on a "medium" version with interactions and less lags!

author: Matt M
comment: Mate love this watch face been using it for over a year now. Just changed from a Sony Smartwatch 3 to a new Asus Zenwatch 2. Noticed the giro or direction sensor doesn't work on the zenwatch. Is this a flaw with the watch or do I need to change a setting?

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: It's probably some kind of hardware limitation, sadly 🤔 thanks for your loyalty!

author: Ivan Jeliazkov
comment: I didnt want to damage the app with a bad review! Yeah, read the description, I thought its a stand alone app. It looks really nice! Best regards

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Thanks for understanding! Have a nice day!

author: Derril Minardo
comment: Love the app, sucks that it is limited to the bounds of WatchMaker. Definitely watching with hope for a standalone. Yes, I would kick in some more money for standalone.

author: josh vanhoose
comment: It's a nice app cool watches and every thing but you got to pay 4 bucks for watchmaker premium to use it not including this transaction.

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: I'm not the developer of watchmaker. I tried to tell him to change this, because it damages this app, but sadly nothing changed.

author: TheLastAtomBomb
comment: The map (Experimental) isn't working for the moto 360 but overall it's a 5 star watch.

author: Tyler Forster
comment: I love it but I have one problem the compass dose not work on the Asus zenwatch 2 I don't know if it's a bug or something else please tell me

author: Azure Fourteen
comment: It does not work for my model of watch Huawei watch I know it could handle it but just won't work please make it compatible

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Read the description! For any problem, send me an email.

author: Demetrius Cassidy
comment: Pip Boy Ultimate watch face doesn't seem to work on the Moto 360 Gen2 - it never starts. The others work fine. Not sure what's wrong.  Edit: After a reboot it seems to work now.

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: The ultimate is too heavy for some watches. I'm working on a faster version! Happy New year!

author: Al-Qahtani Faisal
comment: Absolutely love the watch face but for some reason I couldn't apply it on my Gear S3 Classic. Any suggestions? First time using a smart watch.

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Hi! Please read the FAQ in the description! If you need help, my email is below!

author: Mumen Rider
comment: 4/5 until you update for v.a.t.s.

author: Gerson Arbigaus
comment: Instalei mas não aparece na lista para ativar no relogio.

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Read the description, send me an email for any problem and please avoid bad reviews, it's not my fault if you download an app without reading the description!

author: Trevor Cogsdill
comment: Makes you buy another app

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Nice review, well written. "Makes you buy"? It's all written in description, and I can refund you anytime if you didn't read it. I don't want you to buy another app, it's not my fault if Watchmaker premium is needed to use custom watchfaces. This kind of reviews damages me and my app.

comment: Pretty Awesome

author: Matthew Dzurko
comment: AWESOME!!! I just started the wear faces a couple of days now, but By far best Fallout or any watchface I have found so far for attn to detail in being a fanboy of the game. Great job on all of the hard work.

author: Matthew Freund
comment: This was a perfect app for the fallout fans who want a pipboy for themselves! Would love to see some new updates though, perhaps syncing directly with Google fit?

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: I'm preparing a new update, it should be released in more or less a month! Thanks for your review!

author: Jonathan Lessard
comment: Was looking forward for a Wear Theme like this! It functions well on my 360 sport and has no lag. Will update after testing battery life.

author: Christopher Perez
comment: Constantly crashes my Nixon the mission watch. After about a half hour it comes up android wear not responding and I have to change back to a stock face through the app.

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Yes i can confirm that your issue is related to watchmaker, contact the developers! and if you want, give me a couple more stars ;)

author: Mafaesto
comment: After realizing that this watchface didn't show up anywhere, I read the information from the dev. MAKE SURE YOU READ THE INSTRUCTIONS!

author: Joshua Vincent
comment: I love this app, but for some reason the Ultimate Version won't load on my watch. I can do the 3000S mk4 3.0 fine, but if I do the Ultimate, the screen is  not moving and kind of greyed out. I have a Fossil Q Founder

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Probably the watchface isn't ready yet. You can try to send it to the watch again and wait a couple minutes!

author: Kaylie Tatlow
comment: Brilliant, thanks for the hard work.  I was wondering if you'd consider a vault girl version?

author: Matthew Grainger
comment: After downloading this app, I only have three duplicate watch faces. They're all the mk4 watch face. Please help

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Please send me an email!

author: Eve Ramos
comment: A very well done watch face, unfortunately, I have encountered the duplicate bug. Although, it will supposedly be fixed by watchmaker soon.

author: Vincent Quinn
comment: It's really cool! Thanks for the editable options, you can customise it for your likes. Definitely worth to have.

author: Franklin Boren
comment: Works great! Just missing the interactive parts, but like stated above, this should be fixed soon.

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Email me if you don't want to wait for watchmaker's developers!

author: Nathan Post
comment: This is really cool, dude. Nice work.

author: J.D. Barnum
comment: Fun for those that play fall out

author: Antonio Rodrigues
comment: I can't even see the app

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Just read the description!

author: Ramos Essai
comment: It only has 5 watchface not 10 this is false advertising

author: Bobby Church
comment: Runs smooth on my moto 360

author: Lighning Dash
comment: Cool

author: Mark Passero Jr.
comment: Be patient, because it literally took me about an hour to finally get it to function on my Moto 360 2nd gen. Super cool, abstract look! Pop for the $4-5 for both this application, AND WATCHMAKER PREMIUM, or it simply will not work.  Instructions, instructions, instructions. Great job, devs! Edit: For those of you who have battery issues, give your devices time for the software to settle in. I found that many wear applications work smoother over time, especially larger or interactive application functions.

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Thank you for reading the instructions \o/

title: WAY cool.. But, you MUST READ THE INTSTRUCTIONS.

author: Robert Manuel
comment: It's a great app. Only problem is the battery life. I'm using a moto 360 2nd Gen and the full watch face uses like 10% an hour if I don't use it. More if it's used for text messages and stuff. It would be awesome as a stand alone without watchmaker, but I have no clue how to make an watchface so I have no idea how hard it is. Over all its a great app. I just wish I could use the full capabilities of it.

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content:
You can still use the battery friendly version, and sometimes even reboot the watch is useful,  but I agree with you Regarding watchmaker and its limits. 
I'm trying to build a standalone app, but it's a different kind of work! 
Thanks for the review! :)

title: Fantastic

author: Chos Mcghost
comment: Battery drain not bad at all. Unless you're like me and fiddle with it all day lol. Can't get enough of it. Also just out of curiosity, how do I switch to 12 clock instead of 24 on the ultimate watchface?                                          Edit: Changed it to 5. Just realized it tells me my phones battery life too. Cherry on top. Bravo! Also I figured out the time change. It was in the script.

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Thank you! ;)

title: Beautiful

author: Robby Wisecup
comment: For all of the reviews that say it requires Watch maker premium, just read the description. This face is very well designed! It has a lot of integrated features that really make it nice. I haven't noticed a terrible battery drain compared to other faces. Again, great face!

reply.author: m.i.n.a.r.
reply.content: Thank you! :D

title: Great face!

author: Carlos Nido
comment: Have to say, great job on this watchface. Still rocking my LG G Watch and it works great on it! Your watchface is a great  companion to my phone as I have a Red Fallout theme right now. Looking forward to any future updates ..... oh and people......read the instructions! p.s. .... maybe down the line a version that lets you launch an app on the phone via an additional Pip-boy section on your watchface.... say the Fallout Pip-boy app when your playing Fallout.... just a thought.
